metadata.label: Live Now
metadata.description: Configuration for monitoring when a user goes live on a supported streaming platform.

ignore.label: Ignore Roles
ignore.description: Ignore live now events from users in these roles
ignore.deprecationReason: This setting is not currently used.

roles.description: Roles to watch for users goes that go live on supported streaming platforms.

add_roles.description: Roles to add when a user goes live on supported streaming platforms.

remove_roles.description: Roles to remove when a user is no longer live on supported streaming platforms.
